name: RDCiv1
description:
This is a basic console word game where you are controlling a civilization, trying to keep them alive and grow to a larger population. It is still very basic, so don't expect much of a challenge, but RDCiv2 is on the horizon, with new features, so watch out for that!

Prerequisites: .NET Version 6.0.11    Link: https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/thank-you/runtime-aspnetcore-6.0.11-windows-hosting-bundle-installer
